controls.name: numberOfBlocks
controls.caption: Number of copied blocks
controls.description:
Number of copied blocks (rows).
0 values is special and means "copy until the last block": the actual number of blocks will be max(0,N−K), where K = first block index above and N is total number of blocks.
Note: if K + actual number of blocks is ≥N, extra blocks (outside the source array) are just ignored. In particular, if K≥N, the result will be empty.
